name: Skull Shakes
description:
Made in a few days for the 2017 Make-a-thing game jam.

Move the two skulls with your mouse. Collect potions of the same colour as the skull. Don't hit the potions or skull of the other colour. Keep collecting potions or else it'll get a lot harder to see what you're doing. You might also feel sick.

WARNING: flashing colours and excessive screenshake.

1.1 Update: high scores now save. Visual feedback when collect potions. Other minor changes.

(In 2017 I am challenging myself to make 50 little videogames to get more familiar with the tools. I make no guarantee that any of the games are good, but that's not really the point. This is game #4 or 50.)
